Weather Tracker is a demo application utilizing several modern libraries and design patterns. This demo utilizes DarkSky API's for accurate weather forecasts. It also uses the following libraries: 

 Constraint Layout 1.0.2 
 Conductor 
 RxJava 2 and RxAndroid 2 
 Dagger 2 
 Butterknife 
 Retrofit 2
